dict.acceptation: 预防；阻碍；阻止；[宗教]引领；

sent.orig: These aims are to prevent file is open and prevent the file from wrongful replication.
sent.trans: 这些目的都是为了防止文件被扫瞄与防止文件被不当复制。

sent.orig: Vary your training routes. This will prevent boredom and prevent your body from acclimated.
sent.trans: 变换跑步路线。增加跑步乐趣，使身体适应不同环境。

sent.orig: The stopper can prevent airiness. Bravery has separator inside, prevent airiness.
sent.trans: 木塞能阻止空气流通。内胆有隔离层，阻止空气流通。

sent.orig: ReserchersResearchers found prevent it could prevent 100,000 heart attacks attacks and 92,000 death deaths every year.
sent.trans: 研究人员发现这每年可以避免100，00例心脏病发作和92，000例死亡。

sent.orig: To prevent evaporative effects upon the skin there was little air movement.
sent.trans: 为了阻止蒸汽对皮肤的影响，受控环境中几乎没有空气流动。
